statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT input_name, input_quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE input_type='electronics';
SELECT input_name, input_quantity FROM inventory_management ORDER BY input_quantity DESC;
SELECT input_type, COUNT(input_id) AS total_inputs FROM inventory_management GROUP BY input_type;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE input_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE input_type = 'Electronics' ORDER BY input_quantity DESC;
SELECT input_id, input_name, input_supplier FROM inventory_management WHERE input_quantity > 10;
SELECT input_name, input_type, input_supplier FROM inventory_management WHERE input_quantity <= 50 AND input_supplier LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT input_id, input_name, input_quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE input_supplier = 'Supplier A' ORDER BY input_quantity ASC;
SELECT input_name, input_type FROM inventory_management WHERE input_type IN ('Furniture', 'Clothing') LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers;
SELECT fertilizer_name, nutrient_content FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT seed_name, harvest_period FROM seeds ORDER BY harvest_period ASC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds;
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT seed_name, harvest_period FROM seeds ORDER BY harvest_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE harvest_period = 'Spring' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT seed_name, quantity, harvest_period FROM seeds WHERE harvest_period = 'Summer';
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT pesticide_name, type FROM pesticides ORDER BY pesticide_name DESC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM seeds WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT fertilizer_name, manufacturer FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY fertilizer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM pesticides WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' AND type = 'herbicide';
SELECT seed_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM seeds WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT pesticide_name, quantity, type FROM pesticides ORDER BY quantity DESC, pesticide_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT name, quantity FROM seeds;
SELECT name, quantity FROM seeds ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'seeds';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT seed_id, name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE name LIKE '%tomato%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT inventory.item_id, inventory.item_type, name FROM inventory JOIN fertilizers ON inventory.item_id = fertilizers.fertilizer_id;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM seeds;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_seeds FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT inventory_id, product_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY seed_name DESC;
SELECT seed_id, seed_name, price FROM seeds WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC, seed_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM inventory WHERE product_type = 'fertilizer');
SELECT inventory_id, product_id, product_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 1 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM seeds JOIN inventory ON seeds.seed_id = inventory.product_id WHERE seeds.quantity > 50 AND inventory.warehouse_id = 1 ORDER BY seeds.seed_name ASC, inventory.quantity DESC;
